Title: My technology list
Description: These are the technologies that I am continuously studying and applying in development projects.

SkillsData.name: HTML/CSS
SkillsData.description: HTML is a markup language used in building web pages.

SkillsData.name: Javascript
SkillsData.description: JavaScript is a high-level interpreted programming language.

SkillsData.name: Typescript
SkillsData.description: TypeScript is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript that adds static typing.

SkillsData.name: ReactJs
SkillsData.description: React is a JavaScript front-end library focused on creating interfaces.

SkillsData.name: Next
SkillsData.description: Next.js is an open-source React front-end development framework.

SkillsData.name: NodeJs
SkillsData.description: Node.js allows the execution of JavaScript code outside a browser.

SkillsData.name: Jest
SkillsData.description: Jest is a JavaScript testing framework built on top of Jasmine and maintained by Meta.

SkillsData.name: MongoDB
SkillsData.description: MongoDB is a free document-oriented database software.

SkillsData.name: PostgreSQL
SkillsData.description: PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system

SkillsData.name: IBM Watson
SkillsData.description: Watson is IBM's business cognitive services platform
